dataset.img_after_resize: Important, the image resolution that models actually work on, the images will be first resampled to this resolution, set [-1,-1,-1] if take the original image resolution

demons.nifty_bin: the path of the nifty reg binary file
demons.shrink_factors: the multi-scale shrink factor in demons
demons.shrink_sigma: amount of smoothing which is done prior to resmapling the image using the given shrink factor
demons.std: the standard deviation in demon registration
